name: Pirate Dice Roller
description:
Nothing is more fun that rolling dice in real life. No app can stand up to that. But rolling on a phone can be fun in other ways!

Pirate Dice Roller is a fun way to roll dice for tabletop RPGs. Are you playing a pirate-themed campaign? Is your character always on a boat? Do you like the sweet sound of cannons firing?

Pirate Dice Roller is for you!
